extends Object

      boolean acceptShareOffer(String collectionId, String username)
      Accept share offer for the movie collection of given id for the user of given username.

      Add a new movie collection.
      void deleteMovieCollection(String collectionId)
      Delete the movie collection of given id.
      Optional<CollectionPermission> getCollectionPermission(String collectionId, String username)
      Returns the collection permission for the user of given username for the collection of given id.
      List<CollectionPermission> getCollectionPermissions(String collectionId)
      Return list of collection permissions for the given collection excluding permission for the owner.
      Optional<String> getDefaultCollectionId(String username)
      Returns the id of the given users default movie collection, or null if no default movie collection has been set.
      List<MovieCollection> getShareOfferMovieCollections(String username)
      Returns list of movie collections that other users have offered to share with the user where share offer has not been accepted.
      Optional<MovieCollection> getViewableMovieCollection(String collectionId, String username)
      Returns the movie collection for the given collectionId.
      List<MovieCollection> getViewableMovieCollections(String username)
      Returns list of movie collections user has authority to view (or edit).
      void setDefaultCollection(String username, String collectionId)
      Sets the default collection of the user of given username to the movie collection of given id.
      void shareCollection(String collectionId, String username, boolean editable)
      Offer to share a collection of given id to the given username.
      boolean unshareCollection(String collectionId, String username)
      Revokes permission of given user to be able to view or edit the given collection.
      void updateEditable(String collectionId, String username, boolean editable)
      Sets whether or not the given user can edit the given collection.
      void updateMovieCollection(MovieCollection movieCollection)
      Update the provided movie collection.

      • getViewableMovieCollections

        public List<MovieCollection> getViewableMovieCollections(String username)
        Description copied from interface: CollectionDao
        Returns list of movie collections user has authority to view (or edit). Does not include movie collections where share offer has not been accepted.
        Specified by:
        getViewableMovieCollections in interface CollectionDao
        Parameters:
        username - username
        Returns:
        list of movie collections user can view

      • getShareOfferMovieCollections

        public List<MovieCollection> getShareOfferMovieCollections(String username)
        Description copied from interface: CollectionDao
        Returns list of movie collections that other users have offered to share with the user where share offer has not been accepted.
        Specified by:
        getShareOfferMovieCollections in interface CollectionDao
        Parameters:
        username - username
        Returns:
        list of movie collections with pending share offers

      • getViewableMovieCollection

        public Optional<MovieCollection> getViewableMovieCollection(String collectionId,
                                                            String username)
        Description copied from interface: CollectionDao
        Returns the movie collection for the given collectionId. Editable flag will be set based on provided username. If username does not have valid permission for collection, null is returned.
        Specified by:
        getViewableMovieCollection in interface CollectionDao
        Parameters:
        collectionId - id of movie collection
        username - user to get collection for
        Returns:
        viewable movie collection of given id (or null if collection is not viewable)

      • addMovieCollection

        @Transactional
public void addMovieCollection(MovieCollection movieCollection)
        Description copied from interface: CollectionDao
        Add a new movie collection. Editable property is ignored. Owner is set based on value provided in the movie collection. Id will be set within this method.
        Specified by:
        addMovieCollection in interface CollectionDao
        Parameters:
        movieCollection - movie collection to add

      • updateMovieCollection

        public void updateMovieCollection(MovieCollection movieCollection)
        Description copied from interface: CollectionDao
        Update the provided movie collection. Owner and editable properties are ignored.
        Specified by:
        updateMovieCollection in interface CollectionDao
        Parameters:
        movieCollection - movie collection to update

        Description copied from interface: CollectionDao

        Specified by:

      • getCollectionPermissions

        @Transactional
public List<CollectionPermission> getCollectionPermissions(String collectionId)
        Description copied from interface: CollectionDao
        Return list of collection permissions for the given collection excluding permission for the owner. The owner does not need to see their own permission entry.
        Specified by:
        getCollectionPermissions in interface CollectionDao
        Parameters:
        collectionId - id of movie collection
        Returns:
        list of collection permissions for the collection
